entities.name: bridge
entities.description: The bridge is mentioned as a location where the speaker and others disappeared. ("Um bridge is already livid that you lot disappeared right under her nose...")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who told Bridge something. ("...ev en though Dumbledore told her")

relationships.description: Bridge was told by Dumbledore that the speaker and others disappeared. ("...ev en though Dumbledore told her")
